publicationVenue.name: International Conference on Computer and Information Application
alternate_names: International Conference on Control, Instrumentation, and Automation

title: Highcharts-based implementation of the micro video big data visualization system
abstract: Visualization of the micro video big data refers to the intuitive display of the obtained data on micro videos across the Internet for the purpose of helping users to understand the message in the data. This paper describes the implementation of a micro video big data visualization system in detail, which has four steps: determine the visualization objective, choose data based on the objective, display various charts using Highcharts, and design the details of the charts. Some pictures of the visualization results in this system are inserted to help the comprehension. Then some key technologies used in this system are listed to show the specific technical solution.
venue: International Conference on Computer and Information Application

journal.name: 2017 2nd IEEE International Conference on Computational Intelligence and Applications (ICCIA)
